name: SCNShaderModifierEntryPoint
desc: Keys for the shaderModifiers dictionary, each corresponding to an entry point in SceneKit’s shader programs where you can attach a custom GPU shader code snippet.

items.name: static let fragment: SCNShaderModifierEntryPoint
items.desc: Use this entry point to change the color of a fragment after all other shading has been performed.

items.name: static let geometry: SCNShaderModifierEntryPoint
items.desc: Use this entry point to deform a geometry’s surface or alter its vertex attributes.

items.name: static let lightingModel: SCNShaderModifierEntryPoint
items.desc: Use this entry point to provide a custom lighting equation.

items.name: static let surface: SCNShaderModifierEntryPoint
items.desc: Use this entry point to modify the surface properties of a material before lighting is computed.
